title: Boyfights
description: The sort of popular video series by George Bluth showcasing his sons fighting in various locales. Includes A Boyfights Cookout and Backseat Boyfights: The Trip To Uncle Jack's 70th. Bonus Baby Buster footage!
altHero: a boy pulls the hair of another boy dangling from a tree branch
alt2: a younger and older boy begin to fight
alt3: the two boys fight near a backyard charcoal grill
alt4: three boys yell and fight in the backseat of a car
